short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: All in one productivity tool for your day to day needs!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Best extension to keep your productivity going!!

By clicking “Add to Chrome”, I accept and agree to install the DayMate Extension, to set the Chrome™ New Tab search to Yahoo, 
and to our Terms of Use - https://daymate-extension.com/terms.html, 
and Privacy Policy -https://daymate-extension.com/privacy.html.  
 
functionality:
- use the count down to control your focus time.
- notes for your todo list
- weather widget
- option to change the background to whatever you'd like!

You may uninstall the extension at any time.
To remove our extension from Google Chrome:

1) Click on the three vertical dots icon in the upper right-hand corner of your Chrome browser.
2) Go to "Settings.”
3) In the left menu that appears, click on "Extensions.”
4) From the list of installed Extensions, locate the extension you would like to uninstall.
